name: Home Design Object
summary: A CYG file is an object used in an Ashampoo home design project ( .CYP file). It contains both a 3D and 2D representation of a door, window, appliance, column, or other home-related item. A default set of CYG files are included with the installation of Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture, 3D CAD Professional, and Home Design.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: CYG file open in Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional
images.alt: CYG file open in Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional
